metadata.title: Don't Make Me Use My Teacher Voice Cute Teacher T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
This witty teacher tee shirt says "don't make me use my teacher voice." It's a great addition to and teacher's wardrobe.
Makes a great birthday or Christmas gift for a new teacher or soon to be teacher. Makes a great thank you gift for a great year.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: This witty teacher tee shirt says "don't make me use my teacher voice." It's a great addition to and teacher's wardrobe. Makes a great birthday or Christmas gift for a new teacher or soon to be teacher. Makes a great thank you gift for a great year.
